_source.short_desc: Webexpenses is an expense management system and app. It automates your expense processes to save time and money. Support included.
_source.long_desc:
Webexpenses provides software to automate all of your business spend. Our expense management system and app and invoice processing solution save your business time and money by automating expense reports, compliance, error checks, invoices, and more. Integrate with your existing ERP for better workflow and visibility. 

>> Expense pricing includes 24/6, in-house (US, UK, Australia) human support, Over 100+  software upgrades per year, Unlimited submission per month, custom system configuration.
_source.pricing_details: The Webexpenses solution can be configured to your exact requirements. Pricing is based on number of active users submitting expenses a month and the features your business requires. Users can make unlimited claims for a fixed fee. Monthly prices do not include configuration fees. There are no long term contracts just a 90 day notice period. Android and iPhone apps are available free of charge to Webexpenses clients.
_source.target_audience: Webexpenses serves clients from all industries in over 70 countries worldwide - from small businesses to multi-national corporations.

media.caption: Receipt Capture with Webexpenses Mobile App
Access Webexpenses on a Desktop, IOS, Android or Windows Device

category_features.name: Approval Workflow
category_features.definition: Route documents and other data through one or more stakeholders for review and approval

category_features.name: Booking Management
category_features.definition: Create, update, and manage bookings, itineraries, and reservations

category_features.name: Dashboard
category_features.definition: An assembly of graphs and charts for tracking statistics and metrics

category_features.name: Expense Tracking
category_features.definition: Detailed log and record of costs

category_features.name: Mobile Access
category_features.definition: Access the software remotely via mobile devices

category_features.name: Online Booking
category_features.definition: End users can create various types of travel reservations (flights, hotels, rental cars, trains, travel insurance, etc.)

category_features.name: Policy Management
category_features.definition: A set of guidelines regarding different business scenarios

category_features.name: Real-time Alerts
category_features.definition: Receive notification of issues as soon as they occur

category_features.name: Reminders
category_features.definition: Notices sent to individuals when a task, deadline, appointment, or activity is approaching

category_features.name: Reporting/Analytics
category_features.definition: View and track pertinent metrics

category_features.name: Restriction Management
category_features.definition: Establish limitations based on certain conditions

related_products.short_desc: SAP Concur takes you beyond automation to a completely connected spend management solution that grows with your business
related_products.features: SAP Concur Travel takes companies of all sizes and stages beyond automation to a completely connected spend management solution encompassing travel, expense, vendor invoice, compliance and risk. Our global expertise, industry-leading innovation and dynamic ecosystem of diverse partners and applications unlock powerful insights that help businesses reduce complexity and see spending clearly, so they can manage it proactively.

related_products.short_desc:
The happy expense reporting system. 
For users and expense managers, we make expense reporting easy, automated and integrated.
related_products.features: Awarded 'Best' for Value, Ease of Use & Support, USA, Canada & UK. ExpensePoint fully automates your employee expense report process. Our Receipt Reader system automatically creates expenses from receipt images captured via the ExpensePoint mobile app and any emailed receipts. ExpensePoint includes credit card integration, approval routing, Auto GPS mileage tracking & much more. With clients in over 106 countries such as Deloitte, Pita Pit, SodaStream, & Karcher. See all of our 5-star reviews.

related_products.short_desc: Divvy is the worlds fastest growing Expense Management solution that's completely FREE, plus offers 1% cash back and 15-50% off travel.
related_products.features: Divvy is a 100% FREE Travel & Expense Management platform for businesses to better manage travel, per diem, team budgets, and eliminate expense reports. By integrating real-time tracking for every business transaction, Divvy gives organizations instant insights into their spend. With Divvy, you can make informed cash flow decisions, curb losses before they happen, and never have to save a receipt again. Divvy is also completely FREE, plus offers 1% cash back and 15-50% off travel.

related_products.short_desc: The world's leading independent online booking and distribution platform. Save time, get connected & ultimately grow your business.
related_products.features: Rezdy is the world's leading independent B2B SaaS booking and distribution platform for tours, activities & attractions. Their powerful booking software helps thousands of tour and activity operators, in over 130 countries, save time and grow their direct business. Operators of all sizes, regardless of their chosen booking software, are further empowered to connect and trade with local and international agents at scale through their unparalleled B2B distribution platform, Rezdy Channel Manager.

related_products.short_desc: Spendesk is the 7-in-1 spend management solution that makes travel easy for busy employees, managers, and finance teams.
related_products.features: Spendesk is the 7-in-1 spend management solution that makes company travel easy. Book trips with virtual cards for secure online payments, and process airline or accommodation invoices with simple workflows. Travellers have smart debit cards to pay anywhere in the world, on-budget and within the expense policy you choose. Managers approve payments and card top-ups from anywhere, and finance teams always know what's been spent. Travel should create business opportunities & growth - not admin.

related_products.short_desc: TripActions is an all-in-one travel, corporate card, and expense management solution that helps companies save time and money.
related_products.features: TripActions is the only all-in-one travel, corporate card, and expense management solution, providing 8,800+ customers around the globe unprecedented visibility and control over spend. Trusted by travel managers and finance teams alike, TripActions and TripActions Liquid leverage real-time data to help companies keep traveling employees safe, reduce spend, and drive productivity.

related_products.short_desc: TravelBank's travel management system provides you with a single, beautifully designed experience to book all flights, hotels, and cars
related_products.features: TravelBank delivers a better corporate travel management experience. One platform for your travelers to book flights, hotels, cars, and more. Turn on rewards incentives to reduce spend. Create and deploy custom policies with ease. Reducing company spend by 30% on average while improving employee happiness through a user-friendly design.

related_products.short_desc: TravelPerk is the top-rated all-in-one business travel management tool. Manage your domestic and international business travel wisely.
related_products.features:
We're making it easier, faster, & cheaper to book business trips & keep travelers safe & happy, while giving companies the control they need. 

Plan every aspect of a trip in one place-easily set policies, manage invoices, reclaim VAT & track spend. Save up to 30% thanks to unparalleled trip options & prices. 

Got a problem? Our #1 rated 7-star Customer Care team respond in just 15 seconds!

No wonder 3000 businesses have already chosen TravelPerk.

So what are you waiting for? Book a demo now.

related_products.short_desc:
Control your spend with budgets and automate everything in between.

Because you've got better things to do than approving expenses.
related_products.features:
Control your spend with budgets and automate everything in between. Because you've got better things to do than approving expenses.

With the Lola.com Financial operations platform - you can track your budget-to-actuals in real-time. Without expense reports. You can give everyone a card, pay your bills, and handle reimbursements.

Did we mention you can book flights, hotels, and cars too? 

All with 24/7 in-app support for any card issues, trip changes, or cancellations.

related_products.short_desc: Save time and money on business travel all while improving your travelers' experience.
related_products.features: The world's business travel platform for a fast-changing travel landscape. Talk to a product specialist & discover how Egencia can help you manage travel expenses, streamline the booking process, & maximize savings. Egencia is supported by the powerful backing of American Express Global Business Travel. Together we provide support & flexibility to 2 million business travelers for all organizations. We are here to take care of your travelers, so your travelers can take care of your business.

related_products.short_desc: Apptricity Travel & Expense manager automates the end to end process of travel and expense management.
related_products.features: Apptricity Travel & Expense manager automates expenses via credit card download, or receipt OCR, and auditing ;comprehensive reporting, and spending policy compliance. This TEM solution provides real-time visibility into expense transactions without waiting for an excel spreadsheet. A single Tenant SaaS with no co-mingling of data, easy to use with minimal training, exact fit solution to customer's specs of pages, workflows and expense policies.

similar_products.short_desc: Travel, expense and invoice made easy.
similar_products.features: Emburse Certify Travel is a web-based, easy-to-use travel booking solution for small to large businesses. With automated expense reporting and streamlined workflow, Certify can eliminate the need for spreadsheets, paper receipts while reducing the time spent creating, approving and reimbursing a report. Certify makes processing company invoices simple with an automated AP solution that's seamlessly integrated into the leading Certify expense management platform.

similar_products.short_desc: Routespring is here to help you make work trips, without paying for it.
similar_products.features:
**MAKE WORK TRIPS, WITHOUT PAYING FOR IT**

FluidTravel: Help your teams #GoFurther with #1 easiest to use travel management platform. Manage travel payments, policies, approvals, and more - all in one place! 

FluidCash: Empower your empower your employees to pay for any business need, while finance team maintains visibility & control. 

FluidSupport: Experience the better than the best customer support with Routespring. User satisfaction is guaranteed.

TravelWorks is a Cloud back office system for travel agencies and tour operators. 
Features include invoicing, account receivable, account payable, general ledger, real-time advanced reports, mobile app etc.
Optional modules available for tour management: tour creation, inventory management, online booking...

similar_products.short_desc: SalesTrip is a travel booking system with automated expense management on Salesforce. Book travel and track spend faster and smarter.
similar_products.features: SalesTrip is a travel booking system with automated expense management on Salesforce, providing companies with a fast and easy way to book travel and track spend. Book flights, hotels, trains and more alongside your customer and revenue data in Salesforce, saving travellers significant time when managing travel. SalesTrip automatically processes expenses there too. By tracking spend against the business purpose, provide your company with real-time analysis to prove travel aids company growth.

similar_products.short_desc: The easiest web-based & mobile Travel & Expense software with robust employee expense management, booking, and reporting capabilities.
similar_products.features: Web-based & Mobile Travel Management with intuitive user interface, powerful booking, expense, reporting, and auditing capabilities. Seamless out-of-the-box, real-time integration with Microsoft Dynamics GP, AX, NAV, SL, D365 Business Central; Sage ERP, Sage Intacct; Blackbaud NXT; Acumatica. Create. Request, Submit, Approve Expenses; Book Airfare, Car, Hotel; Access Traveler Trip Data in Seconds, and Easily Report and Analyze with Full Tracking and Control.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Expense Report software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Expense Report tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Expense Report software assists organizations in keeping track of their business and travel expenses. These applications allow employees to submit records of their expenditures. For smaller businesses, spreadsheet-generating software creates reports to allow for better budgeting. Expense Report software is related to Budgeting software, Financial Reporting software and Time and Expense software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Policy Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Policy Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Policy Management software makes it possible for organizations, businesses, and universities to keep internal and external policies up to date. Policy Management software provides the tools needed to author, revise, and approve policy changes throughout the organization. It can also help policy managers make their guidelines accessible to ensure compliance. Buyers looking for Policy Management software, may also be interested in Compliance software and Risk Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Reservations software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Reservations tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Reservations software manages hospitality industry reservations including web-based and onsite solutions. These applications offer a variety of customizable features designed to suit a wide variety of hospitality clients from hotels, motels, condos, and hostels to travel agents and tour operators. Organizations use Reservations software to speed the processing of information and increase the efficient use of available space. These solutions also typically provide integrated tools for a wide variety of business features from accounting and revenue reporting to maintenance and housekeeping management Reservations software is related to Hospitality Property Management software, Rental software, Tour Operator software and Travel Agency software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Time and Expense software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Time and Expense tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Time and Expense software automates the tracking of billable hours and reimbursement expenses. Time and Expense solutions can be used by organizations in professional services industries to monitor projects on a task and overall basis as well as billing rates so that the appropriate amount may be invoiced. Time and Expense applications can also be used for expense reporting by employees who travel frequently. Time and Expense software is related to Professional Services Automation software, Project Management software, Time Clock software and Workforce Management software.

The pricing can be customized by contacting the sales team or can be calculated using the ROI calculator.
pricing_plans.custom_price: The plan offers custom pricing based on the average monthly expenses, number of claimants, average salary, and other features.

category_features.name: Approval Process Control
category_features.definition: Streamline and manage the process of granting permission to the correct parties throughout task progression

category_features.name: Corporate Card
category_features.definition: Manage and track credit cards that are distributed to employees to use for authorized business expenses

category_features.name: Mobile Receipt Upload
category_features.definition: Scan and upload receipts to a central database using a mobile device

category_features.name: Multi-Currency
category_features.definition: Manage and handle various international currencies

category_features.name: Receipt Management
category_features.definition: Upload, track, and submit receipts in a central database

category_features.name: Reimbursement Management
category_features.definition: Manage compensation for out-of-pocket expenses incurred by an employee, client or another party

category_features.name: Spend Control
category_features.definition: Set allowances and ensure employees don't spend more than the allotted amounts

category_features.name: Time & Expense Tracking
category_features.definition: Measure time to completion or hours worked

category_features.name: Workflow Management
category_features.definition: Create, design, and automate processes within the software

category_features.name: 1099 Preparation
category_features.definition: Create and distribute 1099 tax forms to suppliers

category_features.name: Aging Tracking
category_features.definition: Pull a report on unpaid invoices that shows how much time has elapsed since the date of the invoice

category_features.name: Approval Process Control
category_features.definition: Streamline and manage the process of granting permission to the correct parties throughout task progression

category_features.name: Cash Management
category_features.definition: Collection, handling, management and usage of an organization's funds

category_features.name: Check Writing
category_features.definition: Issue payments to third parties via checks

category_features.name: Data Extraction
category_features.definition: Automatically extract information from documents or websites and input it into a database in a specified format

category_features.name: Duplicate Payment Alert
category_features.definition: Receive an automatic notification when the same exact payment is about to be initiated for the second time

category_features.name: Electronic Funds Transfer
category_features.definition: Transfer money electronically between two bank accounts

category_features.name: Fraud Detection
category_features.definition: Identify and prevent suspicious activity

category_features.name: Invoice Processing
category_features.definition: Create, process, execute and manage suppliers invoices till the payment is made

category_features.name: PO Reconciliation
category_features.definition: Verify that invoices comply to the terms of pre-issued purchase orders prior to issuing payments

category_features.name: Recurring Payments
category_features.definition: Automate supplier payments on a predetermined schedule (monthly, quarterly, etc)

category_features.name: Vendor Management
category_features.definition: Ability to track and store all vendor-related information, such as contacts, services offered, terms, etc.

category_features.name: Billing Portal
category_features.definition: Gateway through which end users can view past bills and pay current invoices

category_features.name: Contact Database
category_features.definition: Centralized database of an organization's customers and clients

category_features.name: Contingency Billing
category_features.definition: Business model where clients pay their lawyer a fee only if the case is won/settled successfully

category_features.name: Customizable Invoices
category_features.definition: Brand invoices with organization's logo

category_features.name: Dunning Management
category_features.definition: Process of automatically notifying clients when payments fail to ensure invoices are paid

category_features.name: Hourly Billing
category_features.definition: Business model that charges based on the amount of time spent

category_features.name: Mobile Payments
category_features.definition: Clients can submit payments via mobile devices

category_features.name: Multi-Currency
category_features.definition: Manage and handle various international currencies

category_features.name: Online Invoicing
category_features.definition: Create, send, and view electronic invoices

category_features.name: Online Payments
category_features.definition: Payment webpage where clients can pay bills

category_features.name: Payment Processing
category_features.definition: Accept, record, and reconcile financial transactions

category_features.name: Project Billing
category_features.definition: Business model that bills clients an amount based on the project/task/job performed

category_features.name: Recurring/Subscription Billing
category_features.definition: Business model that bills clients repeatedly based on set amount of time

category_features.name: Tax Calculation
category_features.definition: Location based taxes

related_products.short_desc: An easy invoicing and accounting solution starting at $7.50/mth (first 4 mths). Join 24 million people who've already used FreshBooks.
related_products.features: Categorization of expenses in FreshBooks is made with tax time in mind, so its easy for you (or your accountant) to file. At tax time you have all the information you need without any of the complexity. Try it free for 30 days, no credit card required.

related_products.short_desc: SAP Concur takes you beyond automation to a completely connected spend management solution that grows with your business
related_products.features: SAP Concur Expense takes companies of all sizes and stages beyond automation to a completely connected spend management solution encompassing travel, expense, vendor invoice, compliance and risk. Our global expertise, industry-leading innovation and dynamic ecosystem of diverse partners and applications unlock powerful insights that help businesses reduce complexity and see spending clearly, so they can manage it proactively.

related_products.short_desc: Gain deep data visibility into corporate spend with the remarkable usability of Emburse Certify Expense.
related_products.features: Emburse Certify Expense effortlessly streamlines your operations through automation and superior customer service. Automatically create reports for employees, streamline approvals, and make reimbursement and reporting effortless for accountants. Certify is trusted by more than 4,000 organizations including Boot Barn, H&R Block, and Virgin Galactic, to streamline expense processing, purchasing and travel booking.

related_products.short_desc: Timesheets that simplify payroll & billing for small business. Free trial includes timesheets, expenses, and HR. Try timesheets today.
related_products.features: Timesheets.com makes it easy to record expenses on a computer or mobile device. You can create custom reports in minutes. Employees can enter funds spent on business trips and enter mileage for reimbursements. You can also track commissions, bonuses, per diems, and whatever else you need right in the system. Our service also gives you the option to track time for payroll and billing with time off calculations, along with an HR suite to store reviews, notes, and more. Try us free today!

related_products.short_desc: Zoho Expense has powerful features to handle travel and expenses, control spending, and customize and automate business processes.
related_products.features:
Zoho Expense streamlines and automates business travel and spend end-to-end. Right from travel booking to expense reporting and approval.

Conversion of receipts to expense claims, report submission approval, and card reconciliation can all be automated. This reduces the time, effort, and hidden costs of expense report processing.

Multi-level approval, spend rules and limits, budgeting, and analytics provide better spend control. See Zoho Expense in action, sign up for a free trial now!

related_products.short_desc: QuickBooks is an end-to-end accounting software that can grow with your business.
related_products.features: QuickBooks Online Advanced (Save 50%) is a cloud-based, all-in-one, accounting and business hub solution, designed for growing, small to mid-sized businesses. Get performance reporting with highly customizable tracking tools, automated workflows, and real-time revenue and cash flow management dashboards. Seamlessly integrate best-in-class Premium Apps like Salesforce and HubSpot (CRM), Bill.com (accounts payable), DocuSign, LeanLaw & more to expand your capabilities as your business needs grow.

related_products.short_desc: Extend the capabilities of your accounting system to include expense management with Nexonia.
related_products.features:
Nexonia is a configurable expense management solution that eliminates manual reporting, ensures compliance, and helps control your T&E spend.

Customers choose Nexonia for:
- Tight integrations with ERP's and accounting systems
- Fast expense submissions with an easy to use mobile app
- Handles complex approval workflows

Nexonia's simple-to-use application is fully integrated with ERPs, credit cards, and other systems supporting a variety of businesses.

related_products.short_desc: A software suite for small professional services organizations with modules for project management, timesheets, expenses & invoicing.
related_products.features:
Avaza is a software suite for small businesses. It includes modules for project management & collaboration, resource scheduling, time tracking, expense management, quoting & invoicing. 

Set up expense approvals, per unit expense categories and much more in Avaza! Access Avaza in the cloud, and add expenses from any device whether its your desktop, tablet or mobile.

related_products.short_desc:
The happy expense reporting system. 
For users and expense managers, we make expense reporting easy, automated and integrated.
related_products.features: Awarded 'Best' for Value, Ease of Use & Support, USA, Canada & UK. ExpensePoint fully automates your employee expense report process. Our Receipt Reader system automatically creates expenses from receipt images captured via the ExpensePoint mobile app and any emailed receipts. ExpensePoint includes credit card integration, approval routing, Auto GPS mileage tracking & much more. With clients in over 106 countries such as Deloitte, Pita Pit, SodaStream, & Karcher. See all of our 5-star reviews.

related_products.short_desc: Simple time tracking and expense tracking that integrates easily with QuickBooks Online and Desktop.
related_products.features: Minute7 is designed specifically for professional services firms that want to track time and expenses against certain customers/jobs/projects and then sync that data into QuickBooks for billing, reporting, or payroll purposes.  Employees can enter time & expenses from the office or on the go with our iOS & Android applications.  Managers can then approve time and expense entries directly in Minute7.  Track your time and expenses with Minute7!

related_products.short_desc: Fast receipt scanning and easy expense reporting on the go or in the office. Don't settle for standard. Itemize.
related_products.features:
Transforming receipts into intelligent data

Itemize is an Artificial Intelligence platform that extracts data from receipts, invoices, and other commerce documents. The engine delivers intelligence that automates expense management, enhances accounts payable workflows, and improves compliance functions.

similar_products.short_desc: Customizable, transparent, and accurate expense management.
similar_products.features: Does your expense management solution feel like just another expense? Because it should be just the opposite-easy, fast, transparent, and accurate. Chrome River Expense gives you the solution you deserve with a flexible, automated platform that can be configured to optimize expense reporting, save time and money, and help you get back to doing business.

similar_products.short_desc: TravelBank is the all-in-one expense, travel, and card management platform, powering the solution for more than 20,000 companies.
similar_products.features: Modern expense software that you can trust, with 97% customer satisfaction ratings. TravelBank delivers expense and travel management, plus the flexibility to use any corporate card, on one intuitive platform. Gain immediate control of your expense management, reducing company spend by 30% on average while improving data accuracy and saving hours on monthly reconciliation. Opt for our managed travel program, as well, for end-to-end spend management and increased policy compliance.

similar_products.short_desc: Smart and simple spend management for scaling businesses. Request, approve, receive, and pay from within one platform with Procurify.
similar_products.features: Simple, scalable, and straight-forward spend management. Procurify is the leading all-in-one spend management platform that delivers tracking, accountability, and end-to-end workflows for expenses and spending. Gain unparalleled control and visibility with automated approvals, real-time budgeting, physical and virtual spending cards, and more so you can allocate, track, and report on spend from a single platform. Procurify integrates with Netsuite, Quickbooks and other ERP systems.

similar_products.short_desc: Zoho Expense has powerful features to handle travel and expenses, control spending, and customize and automate business processes.
similar_products.features:
Zoho Expense streamlines and automates business travel and spend end-to-end. Right from travel booking to expense reporting and approval.

Conversion of receipts to expense claims, report submission approval, and card reconciliation can all be automated. This reduces the time, effort, and hidden costs of expense report processing.

Multi-level approval, spend rules and limits, budgeting, and analytics provide better spend control. See Zoho Expense in action, sign up for a free trial now!

similar_products.short_desc: Teampay's proactive approach to spend management eliminates the need for expense reports. It's company spend, simplified.
similar_products.features: What if you never had to pull another manual expense report ever again? With Teampay's purchasing platform, finance teams can set spend policies, automate purchase requests and reconciliation, issue virtual and physical cards, and gain real-time visibility into spend. Our proactive approach to business spend eliminates the need for expense reports, resulting in a better experience for finance departments and employees across the board. That's company spend, simplified.

similar_products.short_desc: Routespring is here to help you eliminate expense & reimbursement processes.
similar_products.features:
**MAKE WORK TRIPS, WITHOUT PAYING FOR IT**

FluidTravel: Help your teams #GoFurther with #1 easiest to use travel management platform. Manage travel payments, policies, approvals, and more - all in one place! 

FluidCash: Empower your empower your employees to pay for any business need, while finance team maintains visibility & control. 

FluidSupport: Experience the better than the best customer support with Routespring. User satisfaction is guaranteed.

similar_products.short_desc: The expense management and business card solution for precise control on company-wide spend
similar_products.features:
Divvy has combined seamless expense management software with business cards so you never have to process another expense report. 

With Divvy, you can leverage faster expense reporting, enforceable budgets, and a single platform to offer real-time visibility into all spend. Ready to gain more control and streamline your spend management-in a one-stop, easy-to-use platform?  Get Divvy today to empower your team and save everyone time (including yourself).

similar_products.short_desc: Emburse Spend, a corporate card and spend management solution that allows you to review and approve your team's spend before it happens
similar_products.features: Emburse Spend is the latest advancement in corporate card solutions. Increase your real-time visibility and control by approving your team's spend before it happens. Issue single-use and recurring virtual cards to your team members with your rules built in. Automatically capture, organize, and reconcile corporate card transactions at the point of purchase. Eliminate the hassle of unnecessary expense reports for your team and streamline your month-end close. Free version available!

similar_products.short_desc: SAP Concur takes you beyond automation to a completely connected spend management solution that grows with your business
similar_products.features: SAP Concur Expense takes companies of all sizes and stages beyond automation to a completely connected spend management solution encompassing travel, expense, vendor invoice, compliance and risk. Our global expertise, industry-leading innovation and dynamic ecosystem of diverse partners and applications unlock powerful insights that help businesses reduce complexity and see spending clearly, so they can manage it proactively.

similar_products.short_desc: Our expense reporting tool is an excellent software solution backed by excellent support configured to your exact specifications.
similar_products.features: DATABASICS goes back to the basics by focusing on all of your expense reporting requirements. DATABASICS offers receipt management with OCR scanning, project tracking, mileage tracking, per diem management, audit control, and credit/P-Card integration. We provide real, experienced staff to assist the process from procurement and on to support to ensure the complete user experience for everyone on your team. Direct integrations with Sage Intacct, D365, Oracle Netsuite, Deltek, Ceridian, and ADP.

similar_products.short_desc: SutiExpense is an automated travel & expense solution essential for spend management.
similar_products.features: SutiExpense can be easily configured to meet the unique expense reporting needs of any business. Its intuitive icon user interface and flexible design supports rapid deployment and adoption. Our software automates the process of creating, submitting, and approving expense reports leveraging third party integration and optical character recognition.  Full integration with your General ledger for expense allocation, credit card data import, and seamless integration into your ERP.

similar_products.short_desc: SentricHR helps you automate expense management and track spending no matter where you or your employees are.
similar_products.features: SentricHR streamlines every aspect of expense management by connecting expenses with your HR and payroll data. From submission to approval and reimbursement in payroll, expenses flow through a seamless process that reduces error, ensures compliance, and makes life easier for everyone.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Accounting software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Accounting tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Accounting software automates an organization's financial functions and transactions with modules including accounts payable, accounts receivable, payroll, billing and general ledger. Integration of Accounting applications allows for comprehensive, real-time, on-demand analysis of an organization's financial status. Toolsets within Accounting solutions can often be customized to the specific needs of an organization. Accounting software is related to Audit software, Billing and Invoicing software, Compliance software and Financial Reporting software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Accounts Payable software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Accounts Payable tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Accounts Payable software automates the process of controlling cash expenditures. These applications help improve cash management and reduce effort by tracking invoices, providing tools for capturing errors, and generating reports. Accounts Payable solutions are designed to work with General Ledger and Accounting applications. Accounts Payable software is related to Accounting software and Billing and Invoicing software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Spend Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Spend Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Spend Management software helps companies track and report on actual expenditures as well as control these expenditures through tools that limit amounts that can be spent by employees.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Time and Expense software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Time and Expense tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Time and Expense software automates the tracking of billable hours and reimbursement expenses. Time and Expense solutions can be used by organizations in professional services industries to monitor projects on a task and overall basis as well as billing rates so that the appropriate amount may be invoiced. Time and Expense applications can also be used for expense reporting by employees who travel frequently. Time and Expense software is related to Professional Services Automation software, Project Management software, Time Clock software and Workforce Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Time Tracking software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Time Tracking tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Time Tracking software automates the tracking of billable hours. Time Tracking solutions can be used by organizations in professional services industries to monitor projects on a task and overall basis as well as billing rates so that the appropriate amount may be invoiced. Time Tracking software is related to Professional Services Automation software, Project Management software, Time Clock software and Workforce Management software.

pricing_plans.name: Basic
pricing_plans.description: The custom plan pricing follows an pay-as-you-go model and is calculated according to the number of claimants, average expenses per month, average salary, and other features. The pricing can be customized by contacting the sales team or can be calculated using the ROI calculator.
pricing_plans.custom_price: The plan offers custom pricing based on the average monthly expenses, number of claimants, average salary, and other features.
